result.eng: They came back at the end of the summer.
result.ga: Tháinig siad ar ais ag deireadh an tsamhraidh
result.orig: Tháinig siad ar ais ag deireadh an tsamhraidh
result.html: Tháinig siad ar ais ag deireadh an tsamhraidhThey came back at the end of the summer.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig siad ar ais ag deireaḋ an tsaṁraiḋThey came back at the end of the summer.

result.eng: When he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.
result.ga: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais
result.orig: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais
result.html: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar aisWhen he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.
result.ponchtml: Ar imeaċt dó dúirt Fionn go mbeaḋ sé ar aisWhen he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.

result.eng: He was in hospital but he is back at home now.
result.ga: Bhí sé san ospidéal ach tá sé ar ais sa bhaile anois
result.orig: Bhí sé san ospidéal ach tá sé ar ais sa bhaile anois
result.html: Bhí sé san ospidéal ach tá sé ar ais sa bhaile anoisHe was in hospital but he is back at home now.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé san ospidéal aċ tá sé ar ais sa ḃaile anoisHe was in hospital but he is back at home now.

result.eng: At the start of the seventies people started to return home.
result.ga: I dtús na seachtóidí thosaigh daoine ag filleadh ar ais abhaile
result.orig: I dtús na seachtóidí thosaigh daoine ag filleadh ar ais abhaile
result.html: I dtús na seachtóidí thosaigh daoine ag filleadh ar ais abhaileAt the start of the seventies people started to return home.
result.ponchtml: I dtús na seaċtóidí ṫosaiġ daoine ag filleaḋ ar ais aḃaileAt the start of the seventies people started to return home.

result.eng: When a loan is paid back regularly...
result.ga: Nuair a íoctar iasacht ar ais go rialta
result.orig: Nuair a íoctar iasacht ar ais go rialta
result.html: Nuair a íoctar iasacht ar ais go rialtaWhen a loan is paid back regularly...
result.ponchtml: Nuair a íoctar iasaċt ar ais go rialtaWhen a loan is paid back regularly...

result.eng: You don't have to pay me the twenty pounds back.
result.ga: Níl ort an fiche punt sin a íoc ar ais liom
result.orig: Níl ort an fiche punt sin a íoc ar ais liom
result.html: Níl ort an fiche punt sin a íoc ar ais liomYou don't have to pay me the twenty pounds back.
result.ponchtml: Níl ort an fiċe punt sin a íoc ar ais liomYou don't have to pay me the twenty pounds back.

result.eng: Here is your money back.
result.ga: Seo duit do chuid airgid ar ais
result.orig: Seo duit do chuid airgid ar ais
result.html: Seo duit do chuid airgid ar aisHere is your money back.
result.ponchtml: Seo duit do ċuid airgid ar aisHere is your money back.

result.eng: They walked back to the place from which they had come.
result.ga: Shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teacht
result.orig: Shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teacht
result.html: Shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teachtThey walked back to the place from which they had come.
result.ponchtml: Ṡiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raiḃ siad tar éis teaċtThey walked back to the place from which they had come.

result.eng: He gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ga: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.orig: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.html: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sé geall dom go dtiocfaiḋ sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.

result.eng: They came back.
result.ga: Tháinig siad ar ais
result.orig: Tháinig siad ar ais
result.html: Tháinig siad ar aisThey came back.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig siad ar aisThey came back.

result.eng: Call back again, please.
result.ga: Glaoigh ar ais aríst le do thoil
result.orig: Glaoigh ar ais aríst le do thoil
result.html: Glaoigh ar ais aríst le do thoilCall back again, please.
result.ponchtml: Glaoiġ ar ais aríst le do ṫoilCall back again, please.

result.eng: Come back here in two weeks' time.
result.ga: Tar ar ais anseo i gceann coicíse
result.orig: Tar ar ais anseo i gceann coicíse
result.html: Tar ar ais anseo i gceann coicíseCome back here in two weeks' time.
result.ponchtml: Tar ar ais anseo i gceann coicíseCome back here in two weeks' time.

result.eng: Welcome back to Baile na hAbhann.
result.ga: Fáilte ar ais go Baile na hAbhann
result.orig: Fáilte ar ais go Baile na hAbhann
result.html: Fáilte ar ais go Baile na hAbhannWelcome back to Baile na hAbhann.
result.ponchtml: Fáilte ar ais go Baile na hAḃannWelcome back to Baile na hAbhann.

result.eng: It is really nice to be back.
result.ga: Tá sé fíordheas a bheith ar ais
result.orig: Tá sé fíordheas a bheith ar ais
result.html: Tá sé fíordheas a bheith ar aisIt is really nice to be back.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé fíorḋeas a ḃeiṫ ar aisIt is really nice to be back.

result.eng: I just came back.
result.ga: Níl mé ach díreach tagtha ar ais
result.orig: Níl mé ach díreach tagtha ar ais
result.html: Níl mé ach díreach tagtha ar aisI just came back.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé aċ díreaċ tagṫa ar aisI just came back.

result.eng: It was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ga: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.orig: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.html: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé fíorḋeas cúpla seaċtain a ċaiṫeaṁ anseo aċ beiḋ mé sásta a ḃeiṫ ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.

result.eng: Welcome back. On the programme today I am talking to Aoife Ní Loideáin.
result.ga: Tá fáilte romhaibh ar ais Ar an chlár inniu tá mé ag caint le Aoife Ní Loideáin
result.orig: Tá fáilte romhaibh ar ais Ar an chlár inniu tá mé ag caint le Aoife Ní Loideáin
result.html: Tá fáilte romhaibh ar ais Ar an chlár inniu tá mé ag caint le Aoife Ní LoideáinWelcome back. On the programme today I am talking to Aoife Ní Loideáin.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roṁaiḃ ar ais Ar an ċlár inniu tá mé ag caint le Aoife Ní LoideáinWelcome back. On the programme today I am talking to Aoife Ní Loideáin.

result.eng: She was on an early-morning flight to Ireland.
result.ga: Bhí sí ar eitilt mhochmhaidine ar ais go hÉirinn
result.orig: Bhí sí ar eitilt mhochmhaidine ar ais go hÉirinn
result.html: Bhí sí ar eitilt mhochmhaidine ar ais go hÉirinnShe was on an early-morning flight to Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ar eitilt ṁoċṁaidine ar ais go hÉirinnShe was on an early-morning flight to Ireland.

result.eng: The airplanes went back to America.
result.ga: Chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go Meiriceá
result.orig: Chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go Meiriceá
result.html: Chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go MeiriceáThe airplanes went back to America.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ na heitleáin ar ais go MeiriceáThe airplanes went back to America.

result.eng: The spy was sending reports back to Russia.
result.ga: Bhí an spiaire ag seoladh tuairiscí ar ais chun na Rúise
result.orig: Bhí an spiaire ag seoladh tuairiscí ar ais chun na Rúise
result.html: Bhí an spiaire ag seoladh tuairiscí ar ais chun na RúiseThe spy was sending reports back to Russia.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an spiaire ag seolaḋ tuairiscí ar ais ċun na RúiseThe spy was sending reports back to Russia.

result.eng: On my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ga: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.orig: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.html: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ponchtml: Ar mo ḃealaċ ar ais as Éirinn an ṁí seo caite rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.

result.eng: Of course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe
result.orig: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe
result.html: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaitheOf course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a ḃí na trádálaiṫeOf course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
